comment.author: 68061336@N05
comment._content: Commonwealth War Graves Commission lists following details JONAS, GEORGE EDWARD Rank:Private Service No:2178 Date of Death:11/11/1917 Regiment/Service:Australian Infantry, A.I.F. 60th Bn. Grave Reference XXX. K. 30A. Cemetery ETAPLES MILITARY CEMETERY Additional Information: nSon of Mary Jane and the late Ishmael Jonas. Native of Richmond, Victoria, Australia. they can be found here www.cwgc.org/search-for-war-dead/casualty/496612/JONAS,%2... A photography of his grave can be found here twgpp.org/information.php?id=2043249

comment.author: 45282459@N02
comment._content: How could he join the military at age 22 in 1916 and die at the age of 25 in 1917?

comment.author: 88100527@N04
comment._content:
He appeared to me in room 42 at the royal hotel in Purfleet Essex do records say he travelled anywhere in England at that time? As a psychic I need confirmation of this just to make sure I have the right person. 
Shey Sullivan

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: George Edward Jonas was born in 1893 in Richmond, Victoria, Australia. He was the son of Ishmael Jonas and Mary Jane Huxtable.
